hero.title: fiveshield
hero.subtitle: Advanced Multi-Layer DDoS Protection for FiveM & RedM Servers. Low-latency proxy with dynamic assignment and Cloudflare caching.

installation.title: Simple Setup, <1>Powerful Protection</1>
installation.step1Desc: Choose your plan and register your server details quickly.
installation.step2Desc: Update settings and integrate our resource for dynamic protection.
installation.step3Desc: Our multi-layer system keeps your server online 24/7.

pricing.title: ADAPT TO YOUR PROJECT
pricing.subtitle: Our protection scales with your project
pricing.summaryWarning: Your current plan (<0>{{plan}}</0>) might not be optimal. The <1>{{recommendedPlan}}</1> plan is recommended for <2>{{playerCount}}</2> players.
pricing.summarySelected: The <0>{{plan}}</0> plan is selected for your estimate of <1>{{playerCount}}</1> players.

architecture.title: Protection Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Our multi-layer defense combines intelligent L7 filtering, dynamic proxy allocation, and distributed L4 mitigation for maximum security.
architecture.l7CardDesc: Inspects application traffic to filter bots and exploits, verifying legitimate players.
architecture.assignmentCardDesc: Verified players are routed via API to the optimal proxy based on location and load.
architecture.l4CardDesc: Our proxy network absorbs and mitigates high-volume network-level DDoS attacks.

caching.title: Optimized Content Delivery
caching.subtitle: Leveraging Cloudflare's global CDN significantly reduces download times and your server's bandwidth load.
caching.cdnCardDesc: Players download from Cloudflare's closest edge location for ultra-fast speeds worldwide.
caching.loadCardDesc: Caching dramatically reduces your server's bandwidth usage, freeing up resources for gameplay.

about.title: About FiveShield
about.paragraph: FiveShield provides specialized DDoS mitigation for FiveM/RedM. Our intelligent multi-layer infrastructure filters malicious traffic while ensuring seamless, low-latency gameplay for legitimate players.
about.infraParagraph: For optimal resilience, we <0>highly recommend OVHcloud</0> as your origin server provider. Our system integrates tightly with OVH's network for enhanced protection against complex attacks.

contact.title: Ready to Secure Your Server?
contact.ctaParagraph: Get enterprise-grade DDoS protection designed for FiveM/RedM. Keep your community online, secure, and lag-free.

footer.tagline: Advanced DDoS protection & performance optimization built specifically for FiveM and RedM server communities.
footer.supportText: Need help or have questions? Join our Discord community.
